body_html:
@Benyuel Thanks for the suggestion - that works for me. However, I don't see the GPU under memory pressure. @reedwm - thanks for your pointers. Here's what you can do to reproduce the error:

import numpy as np
import tensorflow as tf

x = np.random.random((10000,10000))
y = np.random.random((10000,10000))

with tf.Session() as sess:
z = tf.matmul(x, y).eval()
body_text:
@Benyuel Thanks for the suggestion - that works for me. However, I don't see the GPU under memory pressure. @reedwm - thanks for your pointers. Here's what you can do to reproduce the error:
import numpy as np
import tensorflow as tf
x = np.random.random((10000,10000))
y = np.random.random((10000,10000))
with tf.Session() as sess:
z = tf.matmul(x, y).eval()
body:
@Benyuel Thanks for the suggestion - that works for me. However, I don't see the GPU under memory pressure. @reedwm - thanks for your pointers. Here's what you can do to reproduce the error:

import numpy as np
import tensorflow as tf

x = np.random.random((10000,10000))
y = np.random.random((10000,10000))

with tf.Session() as sess:
    z = tf.matmul(x, y).eval()
